website_summaries.verdict: Compact for travel and easy to inflate, this float lets babies and toddlers fully enjoy the water.
pros: Dual air chambers help and an inner spring keep your baby safely afloat
Folds up for lightweight, easy transport
cons: Can be difficult to fold down

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 10-month old!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we got this for our beach trip. Our son is 10 months old and loved floating in the pool in this. I'm a first time mom so I'm nervous about everything, but I felt like he was very secure floating in this. The sun shade is nice too to help keep baby out of the direct sunlight. It was easy to blow up also. I would highly recommend this if you have a little one going to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsey Burns Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Makes a pool day actually enjoyable with a baby!
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for my son when he was 13 months - 16 months in both a pool and the ocean when very calm. We call it the “ring of zen” because so many times my son would just chill in it for extended periods of time without crying and be very content. The mesh material is soft on this legs. The floating ring part is great for holding small toys for entertaining him. You need to stay with your baby while in this for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect infant float
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this float. The seat is shaped properly to allow our 8 mo to sit upright and the sun canopy provides adequate shade. We were able to use it at Grandma and Grandpa's house deflate and put back into the case, which means we only need to buy one for the summer and can take it easily with us for each outing. Highly recommend watching the YouTube video by Swimways demonstrating folding, it took three viewings but I now have the folding technique mastered. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DKCM6124

customer_reviews.title: Good quality basic pool float
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and basic pool float. It does what it should and gives some protection from the sun. My 2 year old was able to lean forward to splash and then sit back to keep the sun from his face. To inflate it took some time as it was awkward to position the mouth. The fold up is easy once you get all the air out, no residual air left or it won't fold correctly. Glad to have this and is good quality, I don't forsee it having holes or leakage problems as with other floats.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Best for babies around 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This float was great for our time in the pool when we visited the coast. My only concern was that my baby sat waaay down in the float and would occasionally lean forward and put her face in the mesh where the water can come through. Then she would cough as if she breathed it in on accident. She is 8 months. This would probably be best for babies around 1 year old but it did work for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Water seeps inside the air chambers - Great Customer Service after complaint!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago for when our grandson visits - in October. Got it out of the package, inflated it and put him in it in the pool and it began to sink. Water entered the outermost ring. POOR QUALITY!! Don't buy it. Follow up 10/21. Contacted the manufacturer and they were willing to replace it but it would not arrive on time for my grandson to use it so they substituted a Spring Float for an adult (me) which arrived today. I love it!!! I can sit in it without getting my hair wet - Its a win! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: RC and LA Rahr

customer_reviews.title: Get it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were both swim instructors at some point in our lives so we are kind of snobs when it comes to pool floats. I've been looking at this for some time and because I'm cheap as hell I refused to pay $30 for it. Then I saw it go on sale and figured why not? I should have bought this full price a long time ago! Its amazing! My pale skinned baby loved zooming around the pool in it. It promotes floating on their backs or stomachs which is perfecto! And it folds up so nicely! Definitely recommend to any parent going to a pool for any amount of time!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Bsharah

customer_reviews.title: Good float for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 9 month old. She leans forward to look at the water and I wouldn’t trust the float to keep up her upright when she does this. It’s steady when she’s sitting upright though. Holds her nicely. Since she does like to lean and explore we are right next to her at all times with this. If you want something for your kid to be independent in, this isn’t it
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Use this for a younger baby, less than 10 mo. Or bored...
customer_reviews.text: So this product is meant for 6mo-24mo but I suppose it really depends on your baby. Our 10 month old fit in it but was not a fan. He felt like it was restricting his movements and play time. Maybe it is because he likes splashing so much and there wasn't much space to do so? As far as safety I'd give it a good rating, but I dont think it's a good play toy/floaty because of the design that I believe is meant for safety. Overall I think this is meant for a younger baby and definately wouldn't get it for a baby older than 10 mo.
customer_reviews.author: Holladay Cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 14 months years old
customer_reviews.text: This floatie device is perfect! The size of the leg holes fit him well but I would never be comfortable letting him float on this more than an arm reach away. He doesn't really care for the sun shade so we keep it off. Our baby seems fairly calm while in the floatie but he still prefers to interact with us rather than just floating off on his own. I highly recommend this product, especially if it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Product missing the tab to attach it to the float. Company not responding for return of item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for our granddaughter and the canopy does not attach completely to the float I have been trying to contact the company directly since it can't be returned to Amazon for credit and the phone numbers on the enclosed flyers are not in service. I emailed the company this morning. I would not purchase again. Big Lots has a similar product for less money and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: F Medlin

customer_reviews.title: fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great and even my older kids loved pushing our little one around the pool in this during our vacation last summer. It worked well at keeping him afloat and protecting his sensitive skin from the sun. There were no real complaints but it would have been nice to maybe have a string to tow him around with but if you just have them sitting there it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, it’s not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old fits great in this. But, the minute he leans forward the front of the float will tip in the water, giving him a mouth full of water and choking. It scares me, he is new at swimming and learning still. But this float is not very study. It offers decent sun protection and folds up easily when not inflated, but that’s the only pros.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: 9+ months
customer_reviews.text: This product is rated for infants 9+ months. My daughter is 6 months and we do place her in this. She uses it to sit and recline rather than bobbing in the water. It's a great flotation device and she loves it. It's sturdy but that being said, you don't want to let them float without an adult just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study and solid but bad sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good baby floaty. It’s sturdy and requires little air to inflate and float. It compacts really nicely and goes back in its carry case easily. Unfortunately the sun shade does not provide shade from the sun. It attaches to the back of the floaty and baby really isn’t under it. Wish the sun shade attached over the top of the thing as it doesn’t provide much sun protection at all.
customer_reviews.author: johanna

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. I love it for my child
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter was too small for it at first, she grew into it. I bought it when she was 7 months but at 9 months, it works well. At first I had to tie the bottom with a rubber band so she wouldnt be in the water at her chin. Once I tied it, it worked great. I love the shade it gave her and she can still splash at the water from the mesh area. It gave me a little bit of freedom to swim around while having her next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lesliedls

customer_reviews.title: Baby sits LOW in this float
customer_reviews.text: Hard as hell to fold up until you get the hang of it. The biggest reason we didn’t love this float was because of how low our one year old sits in it. She’s literally mouth level with the water. On top of that, she kept falling forward and face planting into the water. I guess this thing works, but it’s not our favorite
customer_reviews.author: Dancing_Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 6 month old. He’s still a little small for it so we have to hold him up a little but it’s breathable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Milagros

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! My baby loves it! I think she might even fit for next season. Easy to use, a little harder to put away. Makes the pool much more fun and my arms much less tired! Inflation is easy, well, relatively speaking. If you’ve ever blown up an air mattress by mouth then yes, this is so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love! A perfect summer must have if you have a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one-year-old baby girl and she loves it! I bought the blue just because it was less expensive than the pink. Plus I'm not big on gender colors LOL! She fits in it and she floats well and she seems to love it! There's also a little canopy that you can attach and detach and it's supposed to have some sort of sun or UV blocking material in it. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Arizona and our baby has super sensitive skin. We needed something to protect him from the sun while staying safe. He absolutely loves this! He is able to kick his feet and splash with his hands all while keeping his face out of the water. It was so easy to set up and put away after. The cover gives him protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: K&J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little floaty!
customer_reviews.text: This floaty was a perfect buy for my one year old! She loved it and it made swimming with her and my three year old son so much fun. The sun shade works best when you're having away from the soon though, doesn't do much to protect their face otherwise. Overall a very good buy and very happy with the product. Some people have complained about being about to store it again but I had no problems folding it back up into it's pouch carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy86

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but to hard to store
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to take out and inflate using my mouth. My son is 29” and 22lbs and almost a years and a half. He fit comfortably inside. Trying to fold this up and store it is tricky. Definitely not easy! Should come with instructions on how to fold it up. I’m sure I’ll check out a YouTube video on it. The sun protection is so so. We live in Florida so I would like something with more protection. We still put a hat on the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lpalmer

customer_reviews.title: Fills with water and sinks
customer_reviews.text: This product started great, but quickly filled with water in the inflatable areas. This makes it pretty dangerous when my baby is in and leans forward at all. It becomes front heavy and he goes in the water. 😩 We had it for about 2.5 weeks before this began.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this float for our 5 month old! He's still a bit little for it, but with a little help sitting correctly he was able to enjoy the water! I'm also amazed at how well this float twisted to go back in the carrying case! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Whisper17

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby float
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old grandson loved this float. It's easy to inflate and held him up just fine. (he's a big boy) You can unsnap the sun shield in the back when the sun is high and re snap for the low afternoon sun. I put his rattles and teething rings on the float so he played while floating. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we have had this less than a month. When not in use it was out of the direct sun. Within a few weeks time as you can see in the photo the seam split open and exposed the plastic underneath. Otherwise this worked great the 2 times we got to use it before it started falling apart. The kiddo had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Best float!
customer_reviews.text: This float held my 22lb son up easily. He was high enough out of the water that he couldn’t stick his face in it. He loved hanging out in it. I loved how supported he was! Made me feel like he was safe! Would recommend this float 100%!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 month old to use while on vacation. He loved it! It was pretty easy to inflate and provided enough shade to keep him protected in the sun. I didn't give it 5 stars, because it's not the easiest thing to fold back up, but it is a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tallymom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lake
customer_reviews.text: We used these all summer long with our twin girls! They loved them and should still be able to use them next summer as they continue to grow into them. They began using them at about 8 months. Our girls are on the small side so the first few months we used a towel to keep them propped upright.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost two and I tried this so he could enjoy the water without me having to hold him the entire time but he wasn’t having it honeslty lol but i think this is the better one because the mesh allows water through so a baby could splash and have fun instead of straining to reach the water like most floaty devices
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 7 month old and it works super well. I know it'll work when my baby is a year and a half because of the size. The net was a bit too big for when we first got it so I had to tie it up with a hairband to make it a little shorter so my baby's face wouldn't get in the water. The sun cover is awesome and gives my baby a little freedom in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Scaggs

customer_reviews.title: Use caution always watch your child is the float
customer_reviews.text: It's an nice float it keeps them in the water more so make sure that your child is able to hold their head up good. Never leave a baby unattended as if their head dropped they will drown. I love the float because it keeps them in the water where they can splash.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: def not for the super tiny babies
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT float and held up SO great but it is big like my 8 month old 25 pound we had to watch him cause he could do a good bit of moving around. I mean we always watch the kiddos in the pool and would never EVER leave a baby unsupervised this one is just better suited for little bit bigger babies
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Tasha C

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this spring float. My son is 1 and weighs 25 lbs. We have used this more than any other device this summer (and I bought 3 total to figure out which one worked best and easiest to maneuver in the water) The canopy comes off too, which is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MrsT

customer_reviews.title: Great if it lasted more than a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first! Still think it’s a great product but seems we got a defective one, which sucks, because we had planned to use it a lot! After 2 uses (for 10 min each time), the center inflatable ring will no longer inflate. It loses air as you are blowing it up, and even if you blow it up really fast and get it closed, it loses air within a minute or two. Luckily we noticed this before we used it with our baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for price
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is almost 7 months; he's 20# and about 27". This float worked perfectly for his first time swimming. It is wide and sturdy, and I felt safe with him in it. I wish there was an option to tighten the seat around him but it's not a big deal. The canopy provided plenty of shade and I like that it has different positions plus is removable.
customer_reviews.author: JS/JA

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. Impossible to get back into bag. The sun shade does not provide as much shade as the pictures insinuate. Will work for what we need it for, especially at the low price.
customer_reviews.author: BDynk

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much makes it so eaay to take our 10 month old swimming and protect her from the sun. Easy to blow up and holds up really well my friend has had hers for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: B.W

customer_reviews.title: 11 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: it's a great float. easy inflation, surprisingly large, but provides great sun protection. Caution: keep a close EYE on your baby as them leaning too far forward in the float can make them ingest water.
customer_reviews.author: Andres n' Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and love the company bag it comes in!! My little is secure plus the umbrella feature is the best
customer_reviews.author: Brianna C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 4-5 month old. He thoroughly enjoyed floating around (with strict adult supervision). Will be using it for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Bea Malik

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality - doesn't float properly
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold in the pool. My 1yo boy, who walks since he was 10mo, pretty much dived with his face in the water, while sitting in it. The zipper of the bag of the floaty ripped the 1st time we opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: SO Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be my cheap stop gap until my bigger more expensive one arrived. I needed something quick so I got this one. This is by far the most perfect float for a baby. I have 3 boys and the new one is 9 months old. I wish they had a design like this years ago so I could have used it with my others. This one took 2 minutes to inflate and the sun shade is already attached. He loves it. I feel very secure with him in the water. Needless to say I never even opened the big one, just used this all summer. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The baby is safe in it!
customer_reviews.text: The set up process is not to bad, but getting the air out and folding it up is way more time-consuming. I love the product because I know my child is safe if he gets away from me. This child's ring has been a real blessing for my 18-month-old, summer 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great for baby!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for baby!! We could keep toys on the mesh and she had her own little play area. It was lightweight so we took it everywhere with us last summer.
customer_reviews.author: HH19

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 month old baby at the time and he loved it, he kicked back and relaxed, I felt like he was safe and not slip through but he was also able to play with the water which is perfect I also loved the sun protector so he would burn. This will be a product we can use for a few more years, it is a little hard to get back into the bag but other than that we had no problem putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to blow up and set up. It’s got great shade coverage and my daughter loves go float around in it! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Willbrand

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old son LOVES the water, so this float works well for him. My one complaint is that he sits very low and is almost completely covered with water even though he is tall for his age. Like I said it works for him because he loves the water and doesn't seem too phased by the high water, but I can see it possibly being an issue for an average size baby. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: K Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The canopy shade works great!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with float, worked well. 5 month old baby enjoyed it. Just a little bit work to deflate and fold to store but wow I wish I had this for my two older children when they were younger. The canopy shade is something you won’t find on most other floats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Floating
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries to figure out which direction my daughter preferred to face in this, but once we did she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and my son loves it. It gives him a little freedom too to kick and splash with his hands.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at seam and my 12 month old leaned forward to splash and almost flipped over. This is not safe at all, even when properly supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float but terrible sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the canopy refuses to stay open to shade the baby. My 6 month old loves being in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for 1 yo child
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend's 1 yo. They loved it. Said it worked great and the child did great in it. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute Baby Float! Keeps my graddaughter protected from the suns hot rays.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My granddaughter has fun floating around the pool. Really happy it keeps the sun off of her. Not sure how it folds up because we leave it out of the package during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: You will need a pump OR strong lungs to inflate. This is the second one we have ordered. One for my daughters pool and one to keep at mine. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: MichalD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, ok to put away
customer_reviews.text: This is a good float and won't flip over. The bag is great to have but it's hard to deflate the float and shove it back into the bag perfectly again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Seems safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool float. The tough part is convincing the kids that the pool water isnt for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: thomas wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this little raft for littles. Great size. Super easy to inflate and pretty easy to get it all back into the bag it comes in. Great for littles up to about 18mo size. After that they might be too big and tip out. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but keep it open.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it does work. The issue is trying to get it back into it's "case" after using it. It's hard to get all the air out and fold it properly.
customer_reviews.author: P N

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger babies
customer_reviews.text: My baby is still a little small (currently 5 months and was 4 months when i bough this) for this so he gets kind of nervous in it. But as long as I’m holding him while he’s in there, he’s good. It’s fun for the pool. In the picture he is 5 months old and I still had to hold him
customer_reviews.author: S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: This one sucked
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed doesnt hold baby well as other had. Doesnt seem to hold air well either. Hard to inflate too. I've had the same brand other models several times and this model must just have been bad.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: We tried several different ones, this one will actually ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried several different ones , this one will actually hold my baby up in the water , he is 24 lb right now
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful with this float! We used one with our first child and loved it! This one however was a little bit of a letdown. The shade broke halfway through the first use. The snaps on the shade come unattached from the shade so I wasn’t able to snap it on to hold it up. Our only option of using is without the shade, which for me, is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D.

customer_reviews.title: Visor doesn't provide any shade
customer_reviews.text: The visor sits so far back that it literally offered no protection facing any direction, even though we went swimming at 3pm so the sun was not directly overhead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny ones!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my tiny 5mo! This is the only float that worked for us (she’s 12 lbs). She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: TangerineLawBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I feel very safe putting my one year old in it. Very sturdy. Super easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: oren w

customer_reviews.title: Good float
customer_reviews.text: Awesome float and love that it has its own umbrella for baby protection!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward's 5

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby (not infant)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping our baby afloat and out of the sun. Easy to inflate. Easy to travel with. No complaints. It is made for more of a baby than an infant.
customer_reviews.author: slugger13_06

customer_reviews.title: Great float!
customer_reviews.text: Great float that our son loves! The visor is adjustable to help block the sun anytime of day!
customer_reviews.author: A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my 1 year old daughter did not like it at all. My 3 year old however loved it . It was easy to put together . And easy to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Life saver with little babies
customer_reviews.text: Update. From the beginning my son didn’t like it but after few try he fell in love with this thing. I’m changing my review and giving it 5 deserved stars. Nice idea butmy son doesn’t like it. Screaming always when i put him in this thing
customer_reviews.author: Olga Tomkins

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this one yet but have had one just like it and it lasted a long, long, time. The canopy is a real plus for the little ones. Sturdy, fun.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: All in all perfect for the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the pool. Although my son pulled on the sun cover and it broke. My husband fixed the wire by bending it back and it is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: LauriAnne Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Baby (11 months, 20 lbs) floats in the pool somewhat happily for about 15 minutes but then wants to get out and move around. I haven't had problems with the quality of the product as others have. I feel like it has gotten him comfortable in the water, which is very important.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Not super sturdy. Baby's face dips in to water sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked well for us so far. We've only used it in the ocean once with our 15 month old and have been very happy with it. The sun shade is perfect for coverage and you can adjust it to either tilt back or be straight up. I was able to even float on it while my baby was in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At first my baby was apprehensive to use this but after a couple minutes loved it! Good quality for the price and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Gouger

customer_reviews.title: These floats work! But the buttons can come apart!
customer_reviews.text: A button on the canopy part broke after second use of the thing. I had bought a pink one the same kind just pink that works great not broken. But I have a son and the pink works! But I wanted blue.... sucks that it broke so fast.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love,  love this float
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe float for my 5 month old granddaughter. This float is excellent. I can't say enough good about it. I will definetly buy again when I have another granndchild
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Shupock

customer_reviews.title: Hard to manage
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to maneuver baby into at all. Takes two people. Out 1 year old hates it. Once inflated it wanted to curl.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 8 month old. She fits and likes it but I wish there was a way to adjust the seated part. It is a little too “deep” and wish Baby was up higher. She will be able to use it for a long time. Canopy stays up well too
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Good float but my son's face is very close to the witer while in it. I think the seat area in too deep.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our six month old. We obviously had to still watch her or be by her but no product would make a parent feel safe enough to leave a child floating by herself. Perfect for our 6 month old
customer_reviews.author: Dale Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The top can be snapped to the back or in an upright position. I had mine on backwards if you refer to the picture. Overall we like the floatie.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer franklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for (even small) infants!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this float. We bought this for our small (13lbs, 24 inches) 6 month old. The mesh netting was a bit big for her, but I used a hair rubberband to tighten up the legs and raise the seat. This worked perfectly. The float and shade are easy to assemble and have traveled with us on road and plane trips. I would buy this float again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Good for pool use
customer_reviews.text: Smaller areas were hard to inflate. On the water this was not as sturdy as I would have hoped. Hard to fold back up once out of the bag
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my six month son when we went on vacation. It works great. I feel like the product is safe and keeps my son safely floating on the water. The SPF hood top also protects his head from the sun. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Takes under a minute to inflate. Gets the job done. My 10 month old floats in it with no problem and no assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Smith

customer_reviews.title: beware easy to tip over
customer_reviews.text: my 9 month year old son tipped over instantly when slightly leaning over the side. beware
customer_reviews.author: D. Nics

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, worked fine, nice price
customer_reviews.text: My little 9 month old grandson loved it. Perfect for pool time. I think it's a nice item for a good price. Glad I didn't spend more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged. The inner inflatable section had a small hole in it and wouldn’t hold air. We can’t use it for our baby. We didn’t open it to use until after the return window had passed, so we’re stuck with it and it’s a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Piyow

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps baby in the right position. A little hard to get them in and out of the net. Definitely works great for a baby/young toddler
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Floats well, although does not provide the best sun coverage, but enough to make it worthwhile. Also can be a challenge to fold but once you get the hang of it it’s not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Outer tube was delivered with a leak. No way to repair because it is enclosed in material. That material takes on water. So, not only does the outer ring not inflate, but it also sags because of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool float for babies!
customer_reviews.text: A fabulous float forBaby... great buoyancy...great sun protection- hold smaller babies while in float, get a “ young”. Person to blow up the float, time needed to deflate float... Overall, the perfect pool item for all of our grand babies!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. I

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this morning was so happy. Worked perfect for my grand baby today her first day on the lake. Kept sun off of her, easy to float she was perfect. So happy with my buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Love

customer_reviews.title: Great must have for babies in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Great for pools, lakes, and calm ocean water. Fairly easy to inflate the outer and inner pieces. Shade attachment is easy to put on. Love that there is a carrying tote. Folds up nicely. Our baby loved it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Holds baby upright
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. My 6 month old, 19 pound, grandson loves it! Canopy doesn't cover very well unless sun is behind him. We don't use it. He keeps his hat and sunglasses on!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

product_meta.title: Swimways Baby Spring Float Sun Canopy - Blue Lobster
product_meta.description: Introduce your baby to the pool with the SwimWays Baby Spring Float Sun Canopy baby float! The Baby Spring Float is designed to provide a more comfortable and secure water introduction experience for your child and is the only pool float for babies with a patented inner spring around the outside edge for added stability in the water. The removable sun canopy provides shade and UPF 50+ sun protection. See-through mesh sides on the canopy help you maintain eye contact with your baby at all times, so you never miss a giggle or smile as your baby experiences this watery new world for the first time! Fabric-covered inflation adds durability and the soft mesh seat with secure leg holes provides comfort. A wide base, child safety valves, and dual air chambers enhance security. Includes a mesh play space for splashing and playing with toys. When not in use, the Baby Spring Float Sun Canopy folds flat into three compact circles, making it convenient for storage and travel. Approximate folded dimensions: 13 in L x 13 in W x 3 in H. Approximate inflated dimensions: 34 in L x 30 in W x 3 in H. For babies age 9-24 months. Includes carry tote. Sold individually.
feature_bullets: SWIM STEPS: Baby water float designed to help babies and parents relax and enjoy the water introduction experience
ULTIMATE COMFORT: Soft mesh seat with secure leg holes so baby can kick freely underwater

SAFETY MINDED: Features child safety valves, dual air chambers and a patented inner spring which gives greater stability in the water. Removable canopy has mesh sides and offers UPF 50+ sun protection
PORTABLE: Folds easily for storage and transport in the included convenient carry case - it’s a great pool float for travel!
